DescriptionData.Title: Paradise Prisma Empty Palette Tray
DescriptionData.Description:
This handy empty tray is designed to hold up to 8 of the amazing Paradise Prisma Blendset Rainbow Cakes which are 1.75 ounces each.
The brilliant, multi-color Prisma Blend split cake was designed by the Canadian face and body artist Jinny - Makeup Artiste or Genevieve Houle specifically for Paradise. Each Prisma Cake has a large surface area with equal amounts of each color so they can be applied with a sponge or large brush.
Use the Empty Prisma Palette to organize your Prisma BlendSet Cakes for easy set up when face painting.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Mehron Paradise Prisma empty palette tray
Holds up to 8 Mehron Prisma BlendSet Rainbow cakes
Designed to hold up to 8 of the amazing Paradise Prisma Blendset Rainbow Cakes which are 1.75 ounces each.
